greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Bisection of A120082.
comment: Numerators of the Taylor expansion coefficients of the Debye function D(1,x) at the even powers of x.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..312
Kevin Acres, David Broadhurst, Eta quotients and Rademacher sums, arXiv:1810.07478 [math.NT], 2018.
mathematica: a[0]=1; a[n_]:= Numerator[BernoulliB[2n]/(2n)]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 30}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Apr 08 2015 *)
program: (MAGMA) [1] cat [Numerator(Bernoulli(2*n)/(2*n)): n in [1..30]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 19 2019
(Sage) [1]+[numerator(bernoulli(2*n)/(2*n)) for n in (1..40)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 19 2019
(GAP) Concatenation([1], List([1..30], n-> NumeratorRat(Bernoulli(2*n)/(2*n)))); # _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 19 2019
results.author: _Paul Curtz_, Aug 20 2008
ext: Edited and extended by _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 03 2009
